title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format displayed in a dynamic text item is different from the format displayed in a data/text item.
OB: When inputting new Date() as content for three items and saving and previewing the form:
EB: All three items should show the same format for the datetime values.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Input new Date() as content for three items.
2. Save the form.
3. Preview the form.

Expected result: 
- The dynamic text item, data item, and text item should all display the same format for the datetime values.

Actual result:
- The data and text item display the same format, but the dynamic text item displays a different format for the datetime values.
